description.name: cakebep20
description.tagline: PancakeSwap bep20 Crypto Payment Gateway (No KYC)
description.long: Crypto bep20-cake Paymnet Gateway with instant payouts to your walllet without KYC
features: Accept PancakeSwap bep20 directly on your website
Unique bep20/cake receiving address for every order
Instant payouts settlement to your bep20/cake wallet
ZERO KYC for both the merchant and the customer.
